articles.author: Adam Newson
articles.title: Every word Christian Pulisic said on Chelsea vs Real Madrid, his future, takeover, Azpilicueta - Football.London
articles.description: The American star faced the media ahead of Chelsea's Champions League quarter-final first leg against Real Madrid at Stamford Bridge
articles.content:
Is this the perfect game to bounce back after the weekend defeat to Brentford?
Yeah, the game on the weekend was a tough one but maybe a bit of a kick needed to get us ready for the games coming up.… [+4968 chars]

articles.author: Dan Collyns, Tom Phillips
articles.title: Fuel protests prompt Lima curfew as Ukraine crisis touches South America - The Guardian
articles.description: Peru’s embattled president takes drastic action as fertiliser and fuel prices soar and Brazil seeks to open Indigenous territory to mining
articles.content: Perus embattled president Pedro Castillo has banned residents of the capital, Lima, from leaving their homes in an attempt to quell nationwide protests over soaring fuel and fertiliser prices caused … [+3843 chars]
